verses.roman:
ei saba rasa-niryāsa kariba āsvāda
ei dvāre kariba saba bhaktere prasāda

synonyms: ei—these; saba—all; rasa-niryāsa—essence of mellows; kariba—I shall do; āsvāda—tasting; ei dvāre—by this; kariba—I shall do; saba—all; bhaktere—to the devotees; prasāda—favor.
translation: "I shall taste the essence of all these rasas, and in this way I shall favor all the devotees.
